Key Match Events: Bebe scored a free-kick from 40 metres out, albeit with help from Mozambique goalkeeper Ernan Siluane
Captain Ryan Mendes took advantage of a defensive mistake to score the second goal
Kevin Pina scored a superlative strike into the top corner from outside the box in the 69th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Mendes said, 'I don't know how far we can go. Now we are into the last 16 and we just need to keep working as we have been.'
Mendes added, 'We know it won't be easy but we believe in ourselves and in our work.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde's biggest ever Afcon victory
Cape Verde is now certain to finish on top of Group B
Bebe made his Cape Verde debut in 2022 after switching international allegiance from Portugal
Bebe currently plays for La Liga Rayo Vallecano
Mozambique appeared to be handed a route back into the contest five minutes before the break when a penalty was awarded but then reversed
